name: The silent distress
description:
You are calling your classmate, Jenny, to discuss the homework. Everything seemed normal at first sight. However, a weird message after a call appeared. When you read it again carefully, you find out she might be in danger. You call her back and inconspicuously ask her questions that help you find her, so you can call the police. Your choices decide whether she gets to safety, or she disappears forever. Everything is up to you.

"The silent distress" is a  short FMV game created as a school project using Charles Engine FMV by Charles Games.
